trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Blairstown
There were no other sightings in Blairstown on or around October 14th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile I was going to bed I saw outside my window a large traingluar craft with lights at its ends showing me the shape move slowly north over this area, it may have been following the Delaware river north as it was very large. The other aircraft in the air at that time seemed not to be bothered by it as some flew near. Since I did not see the body of this craft that did not make a sound,and the fact that it had lights at its corners made me think that it was man made. I mean why would a craft like this show running lights. I and my wife saw this as I awoke her to show her this. Now since I have seen this, I would of loved to see its body. Had I had forsight I would have taken a picture and used an opical device to look at it.
